summary: A retexture in high definition of the candles of Skyrim. Chandeliers, floor, tables and wall candles. New bones, iron and wax HD textures.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

A retexture in high definition of the candles of Skyrim. Chandeliers, floor, tables and wall candles. New bones, iron and wax HD textures.

Installation:

1- Download the RAR file manually.
2-Extract the Data folder inside the RAR into you Skyrim directory, usually located at C:/Program Files/The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim.
3- Say yes to overwrite.
4- Start playing and have fun!
author: Bulinguillo
